instruction: In each example you will read a short sentence (or two). Then, a pronoun in the text is mentioned. Your task is to choose a referent which the mentioned pronoun refers to. You will be given two options in each case and one choice should seem much more likely to you than the other.
input: sentence: Fred covered his eye with his hand , because the wind was blowing sand around . He lowered it when the wind stopped .pronoun: it. A) his eye B) his hand
